document.full_text: israel must not let the gaza strip's islamist hamas rulers dictate terms of a ceasefire after a recent escalation of fighting, foreign minister avigdor lieberman said on monday.
document.title: hamas can't set terms of truce: israel's lieberman
lines_and_colors: israel must not let the gaza strip's islamist hamas rulers dictate terms of a ceasefire after a recent escalation of fighting, foreign minister avigdor lieberman said on monday.
